events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to guide you through the recruitment process.
We have completed an initial screening of your resume and experience and found strong alignment with the role requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response to our initial queries and for sharing your availability for the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th at 2 PM UTC with our senior developer team.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with excellent feedback from the panel on your problem-solving skills.
We are pleased to propose you an offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer with competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for providing your feedback. We are happy to know you are excited about the offer and the potential role.
You have accepted the offer to join our software engineering team, and we look forward to welcoming you on board.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to necessary tools, team introductions, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process is now complete; you have officially joined the engineering team. Welcome aboard!
